content.title: Aortopulmonary Window
content.description: Rare congenital communication between ascending aorta and pulmonary artery with separate semilunar valves.

clinical_features.presentation: Heart failure in infancy from large left-to-right shunt

classification.type_I: Proximal, between ascending aorta and main PA
classification.type_II: Distal, between ascending aorta and right PA

treatment.technique: Patch closure via median sternotomy with CPB

content.clinical_pearl: Unlike truncus arteriosus, AP window has separate aortic and pulmonary valves
